name: MCPing
tagline: A Web App that pings minecraft servers to get their Online status, motd, version, player count and player list.
body:
# The MCPing API

This is a "free for any usage" Minecraft server ping API.
Can be used for obtaining the current status of a Minecraft server, ping time, player list, version, motd and more.

## Using the API

### Server Info

```http
GET https://rgghgh.com/minecraft/mcp/api/<SERVER ADDRESS>/<OPTIONAL:SERVER PORT>
```

returns a json string with the server info, for example:
```json
{
  "status": "online",
  "latency": 910.0,
  "motd": "A Minecraft Server",
  "version": "1.10",
  "players": {
    "max": 20,
    "list": [
      {
        "name": "Rgghgh",
        "id": "8354ecdd-7352-4ff4-8d79-7b22f94f94d5"
      },
      {
        "name": "SuperDando",
        "id": "70f5571e-fd78-3c6b-8ee6-19f9e37a9d8a"
      }
    ],
    "online": 2
  }
}
```

if the server is offline, the returned json will be:
```json
{
  "status": "offline"
}
```

### Favicon

```http
GET https://rgghgh.com/minecraft/mcp/api/fav/<SERVER ADDRESS>/<OPTIONAL:SERVER PORT>
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
